channel.title: Help With Handlers Please
channel.description:
I Need Help.
I Want To Know How I Could Make A Handler That I Could Load From Client.Java, And When it Was loaded from that handler, it would be the same as if the code in the handler was in client.java instead of the handler.. i've tried, but it just gives me errors and errors.
I'm Lost.. Help Please?

item.title: Help With Handlers Please
item.dc:creator: @LInescapeowns LInescapeowns
item.description:
@LInescapeowns wrote:

Thanks, that was actually more helpful than i thought it would be.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Handlers Please
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

You would have to make a new class, and instantiate the class in client.java and then access variables/invoke methods from client.java. It is a good practice, really, as it reduces the amount of code in client.java. Mabye you should look up the Java Basics tutorial:
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/index.html

Hope you solve the problem,
Ollie123

Read full topic

@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:
